INDS,Transmissible Spongiform Encephalopathies
What are the treatments for Transmissible Spongiform Encephalopathies ?,TSEs tend to progress rapidly and usually culminate in death over the course of a few months to a few years.,NINDS,Transmissible Spongiform Encephalopathies
What is the outlook for Transmissible Spongiform Encephalopathies ?,There is currently no treatment that can halt progression of any of the TSEs. Treatment is aimed at alleviating symptoms and making the patient as comfortab
